cab.content:
(This Document is the Property of His Britannic Majesty's Government.)
G.T.6149
SECRET.
BATTLE SITUATION - EVENING - 9th NOVEMBER, 1918.
WESTERN FRONT.
British Front.
Rapid advance is being made along the whole front of the British Armies. According to the latest reports, the following general line has been reached:- east of BERCHEM, CELLES, CHEMIN VERT, east of TOURNAI, east of ANTOING, east of PERUWELZ, from there along the canal to JEMAPPES, AULNOIS, ASSEVENT, SARS POTERIES, SAINS.
French Front.
The First French Army is also making rapid progress and is reported to be east of the line FOUR?IES, AMOR, HIRSON. French cavalry is also reported to have reached the frontier. The enemy is abandonning much material as he retires.
General Staff,
War Office, S.W.1.
9th November, 1918.
Issued at 1825.
